settings.sub_feature3: Dispenser breaks? We replace it free

settings.heading: Is it difficult to use?
settings.content: Not at all! The AutoCurl™ is designed for complete beginners. Just place a section of hair in the chamber, press the button, and release when it beeps. There's no technique to master - the automatic rotation does all the work for you. Most users report being comfortable with the device within the first 5 minutes, even those who have never successfully used a traditional curling iron.

settings.heading: Will it damage my hair?
settings.content: The AutoCurl™ is engineered with hair health as a priority. The ceramic-coated barrel distributes heat evenly to prevent hot spots, while the precision timer ensures hair is never exposed to heat longer than necessary. With three temperature settings (150°C/300°F, 170°C/340°F, and 190°C/375°F), you can use the lowest effective heat for your hair type, minimizing potential damage. Always use a heat protectant spray for maximum protection.

settings.heading: How long will the curls last?
settings.content: The ionic technology in the AutoCurl™ seals the hair cuticle, creating defined curls that typically last 12+ hours, even in humid conditions. Many users report their curls maintaining shape into the next day. For maximum longevity, allow curls to cool completely before brushing or styling, and a light-hold hairspray can extend wear even further.

settings.description: I was scrubbing my toilet every week and dreading it. But since installing TrueClean, I haven't touched a brush in 3 months. My toilet looks cleaner than ever!
settings.name: - Rachel M. Tx.

settings.heading: Every Flush Stains
settings.description: Minerals and bacteria deposit onto your bowl dozens of times a day.

settings.heading: Scrubbing Can't Keep Up
settings.description: You remove what's visible but with each flush more is already forming.

settings.heading: Cleaners Attack Too Late
settings.description: Everything you've tried attacks stains after they form. That's why you're losing.

settings.heading: 1. Clip It In
settings.description: Attach to your overflow tube in 60 seconds. No tools or plumbers required.

settings.heading: 2. Flush As Usual
settings.description: Every flush releases cleaning solution directly to the bowl.

settings.heading: 3. Rings & Grime Never Form
settings.description: Minerals breakdown or flush instead of bonding. Your bowl stays clean on autopilot.

settings.label: The Cleaning Cartridge
settings.heading: Our fast-acting, chlorine-based formula:
settings.description1: Breaks down and disperses hard water minerals like calcium, iron, and manganese before they can bond to your toilet bowl
settings.description2: Eliminates up to 99.9% of bacteria that cause unsightly pink and black slime
settings.description3: Creates an invisible protective coating on the bowl surface to prevent new stains from sticking

settings.label: The Bowl Dispenser
settings.heading: TrueClean's bowl dispenser is designed for controlled release. This ensures the perfect amount of cleaning solution is dispensed with every flush.
settings.description1: Flush-activated, releases a precise dose only when water flows
settings.description3: Never touches your tank, protecting flappers, seals, and plumbing from damage

settings.label: Why Does Your Toilet Look Dirty Even After You Clean It?
settings.heading: Introducing TrueClean Automatic Toilet Cleaner
settings.description: TrueClean works automatically with every flush to prevent stains before they form.
settings.text: Simply replace the easy-click cartridge every 90 days to maintain a consistently clean toilet without scrubbing!

settings.heading: Mike R., Licensed Plumber, 15 years
settings.description: "I've replaced hundreds of flappers destroyed by tank tablets. TrueClean is different—the cleaner flows directly to the bowl without touching tank components. It's the only automatic system I confidently recommend to my customers."

settings.heading: Safe for Your Toilet, Plumber-Approved
settings.description: TrueClean's cleaning solution never touches your tank. It flows directly to the bowl—only when you flush so your flappers, seals, and valves stay protected.

settings.heading: How long until I see results?
settings.description: You'll notice prevention of new stains immediately—no new rings will form after installation. Existing hard water stains will gradually fade over 1-2 weeks. Optimal performance and complete stain removal typically occurs within 30 days of use.
